How It Works

Outgoing SMS

We will be sending your SMS to different countries: UK, Latvia, Taiwan and many other

Check if your mobile plan includes SMS outside of your country

We have a dynamic payout system. For some SMS we pay 0.5 Eurocents, for others up to 3 Eurocents

It depends on the access your mobile carrier has.

You must have access in order to use our app. To know if you have access we will run an access test

If we receive any of your SMS during the access test — you are welcome to use Cash4SMS.

If you see "Service unavailable" it means that we haven't received any SMS from you and you can't use our service at the moment. Try earning with Incoming SMS

Payments are made in the first week of every month

If the amount is more than €5, then you can request an individual payment

Incoming SMS

What is incoming sms?

We will send you SMS with random text and numbers. If you receive these SMS it means that the SMS channel is working perfectly fine on your end

What are they needed for?

Content providers and integrators need to test SMS channels all over the world and learn how stable are they

Turn on the Internet for incoming SMS

First of all☝️ Make sure your internet connection is active for the app to count all of the SMS that your phone received from us We

What about payment?

We will be paying 2 Eurocents for each SMS that you receive from us

Get money through PayPal

In order to receive your payment you need to fill in the PayPal form before you initiate the Incoming SMS. Follow the system's comments

Enable all permissions to read sms

In order to start receiving SMS and get paid you have to enable all the permissions to read SMS by Cash4SMS

Step 5

Point the camera at the QR code to download the app

Questions
& Answers

General questions

How do I get paid?

At the moment we are transferring money right after the billing period. So, if you’ve sent SMS, for example in June, we will transfer your money to your PayPal account during the first week of July. Also, if you do reach the amount of 5 Euro you can just type Payout right here in the chat and we will make the money transfer within 1-2 business days.

Does it matter which country I come from?

No, it doesn't matter what country you are from. We have clients from all over the world. However, you need to consider that your country can accept PayPal payments since PayPal is the only payment method.

Which phone can I use for this?

You can use any Android phone.

Incoming SMS

How do I earn money on receiving SMS?

We need to check the performance of the SMS channel for operators. For that, we will send you an SMS with random text. If you receive them it means that the SMS channel is working correctly and we will pay you 2 Eurocents for each SMS received.

What kind of SMS will I receive?

We will send you an SMS with random text.

Is it for everyone?

Yes. To start receiving SMS and get paid you have to enable all the permissions to read SMS by Cash4SMS.

Outgoing SMS

How do I earn money by sending my SMS?

We will be sending your SMS to different countries that you have access to. We have a dynamic payout system. For some SMS we pay 0,05 Eurocents, for others up to 3 Eurocents. You must have access to use our app. To know if you have access we will run an access test.

What to do before starting?

Before using our App you have to check the conditions and prices your mobile carrier provides you with. If your mobile carrier charges more than 0,005 EUR for every SMS sent to other countries, our App is not suitable for you.

What does ‘Service Unavailable’ mean?

If you see “Service Unavailable” it means that we haven’t received any SMS from you and you can’t use our service at the moment.
